DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test performance new transcutaneous ( `` measure skin '' ) bilirubin device ( BiliCare™ ) measure bilirubin level . The investigator plan evaluate clinical performance device point care test . If investigator validate BiliCare™ bilirubin baby 's blood could verify non-invasive alternative measuring bilirubin .
DOC.brief_title: Transcutaneous Bilirubinometry Neonates With Bilicare System
DOC.criteria: 1 . Parental inform consent 2 . Male female newborn GA ≥ 35 wks 3 . Enrollment age > 6 hr neonatal discharge 4 . Prephototherapy 1 . Infants require respiratory assistance ( mechanical ventilation ) 2 . Severe lifethreatening congenital anomaly 3 . Hematomas point measurement ears 4 . Neonates undergone blood transfusion
